title: The Pullback in Oracle Stock Just Created a Buying Opportunity
description: Oracle stock is down nearly 40% from its 52-week high, presenting an opportunity for long-term investors.
content: Oracles (ORCL) recent selloff may be giving investors a rare chance to buy into the tech giant at an appealing valuation, according to Deutsche Bank. The firm reiterated its Buy rating and maintained… [+5096 chars]
